faqs.question: How is the YSR Engineering CollegeFaculty?
faqs.answer: Ans.Y.S.R Engineering College hosts a platform for well-trained faculty to impart their knowledge to students. The no. of professors enrolled at the college with their positions are as follows:Professors - 21Assistant Professors - 83Read More:YSR Engineering College Faculty

faqs.question: What is the syllabus for the AP EAMCET examination?
faqs.answer: Ans.The entrance examination consists of the subjects Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. It consists of 160 MCQ questions and is a State level examination.

faqs.question: Is there a hostel facility provided at YSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.YSR College of Engineering of YVU at present has no hostel accommodation available for boys.

faqs.question: Where can I stay if there is no hostel facility at YSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.As such the college at present doesn't have hostel facilities on the campus. However, for the convenience of girl students rented accommodation is acquired and the hostels are being run on a cost to cost-sharing basis. With the support of UGC & AICTE, adjacent to the main college premises, two hostels meant for girl students are under construction.

faqs.question: What is the BE/ B.Tech fee at YSR Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The BE/ B.Tech fee is INR 10,000 per year.

Section.name: About YSR Engineering College
Section.description:
Yogi Vemana College of Engineering was established in 2008 and was renamed Y.S.R Engineering College in 2010. The College aims to impart knowledge in various disciplines under engineering. The college offers BE/ B.Tech programs in 7 specializations as Civil, Computer Science, Electronics & Communications, Metallurgy, and Material Technology, Mechanical and Electrical & Electronics Engineering, and Metallurgical Engineering. The college organizes the admission procedure following AP EAMCET. The application mode is offline.
Y.S.R Engineering college, Prodattur, Andhra Pradesh mainly focuses on engineering disciplines. The college offers six courses across one stream. The course details, along with all admission criteria is mentioned below:
Read More: YSR Engineering College Fees
YSR Engineering College AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Y.S.R Engineering college offers a B.Tech degree in 7 different specializations. The admissions into these courses will be allotted by entrance test scores. A cut off will be prescribed by the college after the release of the results. Candidates can start applying after that.
Read More: YSR Engineering College Cutoff
The college does not offer any scholarship schemes but the state of Andhra Pradesh offers several scholarship schemes for students who wish to take admission in the engineering college. The scholarship schemes that can be availed by students are as follows:
The college is situated on a 150-acre campus, and it offers sophisticated facilities. Candidates are given all the necessary facilities to make life on campus comfortable for good learning. The facilities offered are as follows:
Read More: YSR Engineering College Reviews
Ques. How is the YSR Engineering College Faculty?
Ans. Y.S.R Engineering College hosts a platform for well-trained faculty to impart their knowledge to students. The no. of professors enrolled at the college with their positions are as follows:
Read More: YSR Engineering College Faculty
Ques. What is the syllabus for the AP EAMCET examination?
Ans. The entrance examination consists of the subjects Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. It consists of 160 MCQ questions and is a State level examination.
Ques. Is there a hostel facility provided at YSR Engineering College?
Ans. YSR College of Engineering of YVU at present has no hostel accommodation available for boys.
Ques. Where can I stay if there is no hostel facility at YSR Engineering College?
Ans. As such the college at present doesn't have hostel facilities on the campus. However, for the convenience of girl students rented accommodation is acquired and the hostels are being run on a cost to cost-sharing basis. With the support of UGC & AICTE, adjacent to the main college premises, two hostels meant for girl students are under construction.
Ques. What is the BE/ B.Tech fee at YSR Engineering College?
Ans. The BE/ B.Tech fee is INR 10,000 per year.

YSR Engineering College Courses.Details:
Specializations: Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Metallurgical Engineering, Metallurgy and Material Technology
			Duration: 4 Years
			Eligibility: Candidates who wish to apply to this course must have cleared 10+2 qualifying examinations with a minimum of 50% score in Physics, Chemistry, Maths in 10+2.
			Selection Criteria: Entrance Based (AP EAMCET)
